Description:
--------------------------------------
MX vs. ATV Reflex continues and develops the game series, familiar to all fans of extreme virtual racing. In a new episode of pilots waiting for realistic physics, tracks, changing in real time, and a new management system that allows for some really deadly tricks! To stay in the chair and be the first to reach the finish line, riders need all his skill and dexterity. The MX vs. ATV Reflex has a new control system, the player directs the vehicle and the driver separately. This lets you perform crazy stunts, and literally, in the reflection level athlete to stay in the chair in dangerous situations. Face with reckless desperation - with fast-flowing rivers, marshes or topyu sand dunes, you can overcome all obstacles.
